name: Der Fluch der Osterinsel
overview: Under mysterious circumstances, a ship with a writing-board sinks, with which the fabled scripture of the natives of the Easter Island could finally be deciphered, somewhere in the vastness of the ocean. Jessica and Stephan, the protagonists of this exciting, interactive thriller, are sent to St. Petersburg, where the logbook of the ship is suspected. But also shady characters are on the hunt and before the two finally get hold of the blackboard, they embark on an adventurous journey around half the world in which numerous puzzles have to be solved ...
